snippet: The New York City Council hopes to prod the Education Department to improve collections for eligible services to special-needs students, Speaker Christine C. Quinn said.
lead_paragraph: The New York City Council hopes to prod the Education Department to improve collections for eligible services to special-needs students, Speaker Christine C. Quinn said.

headline.seo: Council to Scrutinize N.Y.C. Schools’ Medicaid Reimbursements
headline.main: Hearing to Scrutinize Medicaid Reimbursement to Schools
